markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ganzi Gaze](/Feats.aspx?ID=2533) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ganzi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=339" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 96 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You have unusual sensory abilities passed down from your chaotic forebears. You gain [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416). If you already have low-light vision, you gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) instead.

**Special** You can select this feat a second time to gain darkvision in addition to low-light vision.
name: Ganzi Gaze
